One of my favorite competitive game.

I've not been diagnosed, but I believe this game has taken at least 10 years off my life and given me clinical depression. If you enjoy being shouted at by random Europeans, playing on servers that feel like they're in 1995 while we're all in 2022 and little Timmy who bought cheats using his mum's credit card. 

Then CSGO is the game for you.
